item.title: [667] What's wrong with this code (stuck at Please Wait...)
item.dc:creator: @snoop_lion snoop lion
item.description:
@snoop_lion wrote:

[code]package com.rs.game.player.dialogues;

import com.rs.game.player.Skills;
import com.rs.game.WorldTile;
import com.rs.game.player.content.Magic;
import com.rs.cache.loaders.NPCDefinitions;

public class Arrav extends Dialogue {

private int npcId;

@Override
public void start() {
npcId = (Integer) parameters[0];
sendEntityDialogue(SEND_2_TEXT_CHAT,
new String[] { NPCDefinitions.getNPCDefinitions(npcId).name,
“Only Adventurers who”,
“have proven themselves worthy may enter.”}, IS_NPC, npcId, 9827);
}

    @Override
    public void run(int interfaceId, int componentId) {
            if (stage == -1) {
                    sendEntityDialogue(SEND_1_TEXT_CHAT,
                                    new String[] { player.getDisplayName(), "I think I might meet your standards." },
                                    IS_PLAYER, player.getIndex(), 9827);
                    stage = 0;

            } else if (stage == 0) {
		 if (player.getSkills().getLevel(Skills.ATTACK) > 99)
		 if (player.getSkills().getLevel(Skills.STRENGTH) > 99)
		 if (player.getSkills().getLevel(Skills.DEFENCE) > 99)
		 if (player.getSkills().getLevel(Skills.HITPOINTS) > 99)
		 if (player.getSkills().getLevel(Skills.MINING) > 99)
		 if (player.getSkills().getLevel(Skills.HUNTER) > 99)
		 if (player.getSkills().getLevel(Skills.COOKING) > 99)
		 if (player.getSkills().getLevel(Skills.WOODCUTTING) > 99)
		 if (player.getSkills().getLevel(Skills.FIREMAKING) > 99)
		 if (player.getSkills().getLevel(Skills.MAGIC) > 99)
		 if (player.getSkills().getLevel(Skills.RANGE) > 99)
		 if (player.getSkills().getLevel(Skills.THIEVING) > 99)
		 if (player.getSkills().getLevel(Skills.RUNECRAFTING) > 99)
		 if (player.getSkills().getLevel(Skills.AGILITY) > 99)
		 if (player.getSkills().getLevel(Skills.FISHING) > 99)
		 if (player.getSkills().getLevel(Skills.SUMMONING) > 99)
		 if (player.getSkills().getLevel(Skills.SMITHING) > 99)
		 if (player.getSkills().getLevel(Skills.DUNGEONEERING) > 120)
		 if (player.getSkills().getLevel(Skills.STRENGTH) > 99)
		 if (player.getSkills().getLevel(Skills.HERBLORE) > 99)
		 if (player.getSkills().getLevel(Skills.FLETCHING) > 99)
		 if (player.getSkills().getLevel(Skills.PRAYER) > 99)

{

			sendEntityDialogue(SEND_1_TEXT_CHAT,
                            new String[] { NPCDefinitions.getNPCDefinitions(npcId).name,
                                            "Indeed."
                                            }, IS_NPC, npcId, 9827);
				Magic.sendNormalTeleportSpell(player, 0, 0,
				new WorldTile(5888, 4661, 0));

}
else
{

			sendEntityDialogue(SEND_1_TEXT_CHAT,
                            new String[] { NPCDefinitions.getNPCDefinitions(npcId).name,
                                            "Come back when you have mastered a skill."
                                            }, IS_NPC, npcId, 9827);

			}

}
}

    @Override
    public void finish() {

    }

}[/code]

im not that good at coding… thought id try adding a couple things to a source for fun
my problem is that when i get to stage 1 it just says please wait… where you click to continue… this code worked for me before then i tried adding a new npc and it didnt work again

thanks
